mapper.sql: id, name, patent_no, patent_type, price, publish_date, field, patent_owner, Maturity, has_sample, patent_transfer_form, liencese_others, site_requirements, personnel_requirements, revenue_expected, review_date
mapper.select:
select
distinct
,
from patent
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT id,NAME,patent_no,patent_type,price,publish_date FROM patent
and name like '%${name}%'
and patent_no like '%${patentNo}%'
and patent_type = '${patentType}'
and field = '${field}'

select
distinct
from patent
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into patent (id, name, patent_no, patent_type, price, publish_date, field, patent_owner, Maturity, has_sample, patent_transfer_form, liencese_others, site_requirements, personnel_requirements, revenue_expected, review_date, introduction ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publishDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{field,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patentOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maturity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hasSample,jdbcType=BIT}, #{patentTransferForm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lienceseOthers,jdbcType=BIT}, #{siteRequirements,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personnelRequirements,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{revenueExpected,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{introduction,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

insert into patent
id,
name,
patent_no,
patent_type,
price,
publish_date,
field,
patent_owner,
Maturity,
has_sample,
patent_transfer_form,
liencese_others,
site_requirements,
personnel_requirements,
revenue_expected,
review_date,
introduction,

mapper.update:
update patent
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
patent_no = #{record.patentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
patent_type = #{record.patentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{record.price,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
publish_date = #{record.publishDate,jdbcType=DATE},
field = #{record.field,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
patent_owner = #{record.patentOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Maturity = #{record.maturity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

revenue_expected = #{record.revenueExpected,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
review_date = #{record.reviewDate,jdbcType=DATE},
introduction = #{record.introduction,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},

update patent set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, patent_no = #{record.patentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, patent_type = #{record.patentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{record.price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publish_date = #{record.publishDate,jdbcType=DATE}, field = #{record.field,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, patent_owner = #{record.patentOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Maturity = #{record.maturity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, has_sample = #{record.hasSample,jdbcType=BIT}, patent_transfer_form = #{record.patentTransferForm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, liencese_others = #{record.lienceseOthers,jdbcType=BIT}, site_requirements = #{record.siteRequirements,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, personnel_requirements = #{record.personnelRequirements,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, revenue_expected = #{record.revenueExpected,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, review_date = #{record.reviewDate,jdbcType=DATE}, introduction = #{record.introduction,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}

name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
patent_no = #{patentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
